intro: Vireya celebica, commonly known as the Celebes vireya, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of Indonesia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many species of shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its evergreen foliage and clusters of small, fragrant flowers that typically bloom in shades of white and pink. Vireya celebica thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in mountainous rainforests. Its ornamental value makes it a sought-after plant in horticulture, though it is relatively rare in cultivation.
